00017 static inline int normal_readdir(const char *path, void *buf,
00018                                  fuse_fill_dir_t filler)
00019 {
00020         DIR *dp;
00021         struct dirent *de;
00022         struct stat st;
00023 
00024         DBG_PRINT("path = %s\n", path);
00025 
00026         dp = opendir(path);
00027         if (dp == NULL)
00028                 return -errno;
00029 
00030         while ((de = readdir(dp)) != NULL) {
00031                 if (strcmp(de->d_name, ".") == 0 || strcmp(de->d_name, "..")
00032                                 == 0)
00033                         continue;
00034 
00035                 memset(&st, 0, sizeof(st));
00036                 st.st_ino = de->d_ino;
00037                 st.st_mode = de->d_type << 12;
00038                 if (filler(buf, de->d_name, &st, 0))
00039                         break;
00040         }
00041 
00042         closedir(dp);
00043 
00044         return 0;
00045 }
00046 
00047 static inline int fill_root(HybfsData *hybfs_core, void *buf,
00048                             filler_t filler)
00049 {
00050         struct stat st;
00051         int ret = 0;
00052 
00053         /* we are in root: add a path to the real directories (the special
00054          * tag "path" with ":" appended, and list all the tags */
00055         memset(&st, 0, sizeof(st));
00056 
00057         st.st_mode = S_IFDIR | 0755;
00058         st.st_nlink = 2 + hybfs_core->get_nlinks();
00059         st.st_uid = geteuid();
00060         st.st_gid = getegid();
00061         ret = filler(buf, REAL_DIR, &st, 0);
00062 
00063         ret = hybfs_core->virtual_readdir("/", buf, filler);
00064 
00065         return ret;
00066 }
00067 
00068 int hybfs_readdir(const char *path, void *buf, fuse_fill_dir_t filler,
00069                   off_t offset, struct fuse_file_info *fi)
00070 {
00071         const char * brpath;
00072         int ret;
00073         int i, n, brid;
00074         unsigned int path_len;
00075         std::string *p;
00076         HybfsData *hybfs_core = get_data();
00077 
00078         filler(buf, ".", NULL, 0);
00079         filler(buf, "..", NULL, 0);
00080 
00081         if (strcmp(path, "/") == 0)
00082                 return fill_root(hybfs_core, buf, filler);
00083 
00084         DBG_PRINT("my path is #%s#\n", path);
00085         /* is this the real path ? */
00086         
00087         /* call readdir for each branch directory */
00088         path_len = strlen(REAL_DIR);
00089         if (strncmp(path+1, REAL_DIR, path_len-1) == 0) {
00090                 /* the root path */
00091                 if (strlen(path+1) == path_len-1) {
00092                         n = hybfs_core->get_nbranches();
00093                         for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00094                                 brpath = hybfs_core->get_branch_path(i);
00095                                 ret = normal_readdir(brpath, buf, filler);
00096                                 if (ret)
00097                                         break;
00098                         }
00099                         return ret;
00100                 }
00101                 /* the sub-directory */
00102                 p = resolve_path(hybfs_core, path+1+strlen(REAL_DIR), &brid);
00103                 if (p==NULL)
00104                         return -ENOMEM;
00105 
00106                 ret = normal_readdir(p->c_str(), buf, filler);
00107                 delete p;
00108 
00109                 return ret;
00110         }
00111 
00112         /* call the virtual directory readdir */
00113         ret = hybfs_core->virtual_readdir(path, buf, filler);
00114 
00115         return ret;
00116 }
